description: This Python source file defines a configuration settings class using pydantic for a web application, including environment variables, OAuth configuration, CORS policies, database connection info, and URL placeholders.

classes.name: Settings
classes.description: Configuration class for the application, loading environment variables with default values and validation logic.

methods.name: _parse_list_env
methods.description: Static method to parse environment variables into list of strings, supporting JSON arrays, CSV strings, or Python lists.
